subject: Re: pdd15: How do I subclass a parrot; PMC class?
body:
Patrick R. Michaud wrote:
> This presumes that every PMC class also has a Namespace PMC associated with it that points to the class.  I'm not sure that's true for Parrot PMC classes.
>   
It's what I've implemented, though whether it's The Design is another 
question that I'm not clear on the answer to.

Jonathan
